name: plushy bear
notes:
plushy bear

approx. 27 cm tall. made with hook 4 and himalaya dolphin baby yarn.

i would love to see your finished bear. please tag your pictures with @domigurumi and #domigurumi. i‘m really looking forward to seeing your creations. also follow me on instagram and facebook.

this pattern was designed and written by domigurumi. this pattern is for personal use only. you may not sell or share the pattern in any form, or distribute it (full or partially), or post it on the internet, or translate it into other languages.

if you have any questions write me a letter to my e-mail adresse: domiamigurumi@gmail.com.
